analysis.description:
Crowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_contracts/0x7d3d1185ac96a0e5b5260511a73a9e1695d7eae7.sol#391-394) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_contracts/0x7d3d1185ac96a0e5b5260511a73a9e1695d7eae7.sol#392-394)
